sentence.Network_en: They know the atmosphere of those bleak landscapes so well evoked by Auden.

sentence.Network_en: Auden has been fighting Annie off for years, but she will catch him in the end.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥登多年来一直避开安妮, 但她最终会找到他的.

sentence.Network_en: Wystan Hugh Auden ( 1907 - 1973 ) was born in York, England, in 1907.
